content.name: disk
content.description: Information about the disks's attributes in the storage system.

attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the disk instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the disk instance.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information of the disk instance as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: operationalStatus
attributes.description: Current operational status of the disk instance.

attributes.name: needsReplacement
attributes.description:
Indicates whether disk replacement is needed. Values are:
  • true - Disk replacment is needed.
  • false - No disk replacement is needed.

attributes.name: parent
attributes.description: Resource type and unique identifier for the disk's parent enclosure.

attributes.name: slotNumber
attributes.description: Slot where the disk is located in the parent enclosure.

attributes.name: estimatedEOL
attributes.description: Estimated remaning life of disk, based on past use. Applies only to flash disks.

attributes.name: busId
attributes.description: Identifier of the bus used by the disk.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Disk name. Modifiable for virtual disks only.

attributes.name: manufacturer
attributes.description: Disk manufacturer.

attributes.name: model
attributes.description: Manufacturer model number.

attributes.name: version
attributes.description: Manufacturer version number.

attributes.name: emcPartNumber
attributes.description: EMC part number.

attributes.name: emcSerialNumber
attributes.description: EMC serial number.

attributes.name: vendorPartNumber
attributes.description: Vendor part number.

attributes.name: vendorSerialNumber
attributes.description: Vendor serial number.

attributes.name: tierType
attributes.description: Disk type.

attributes.name: diskGroup
attributes.description: Disk group is the group that the disk belongs to and as defined by the diskGroup resource type.

attributes.name: rpm
attributes.description: Revolutions Per Minute (RPMs).

attributes.name: isSED
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the disk is a Self-Encrypting Drive (SED).
  • true - Disk is a SED.
  • false - Disk is not a SED.

attributes.name: isSystem
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the disk contains System data.
  • true - Disk contains System data.
  • false - Disk does not contain System data.

attributes.name: currentSpeed
attributes.description: Current speed.

attributes.name: maxSpeed
attributes.description: Maximum speed.

attributes.name: pool
attributes.description: Pool that the disk belongs, as defined by the pool resource type.

attributes.name: isInUse
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the disk contains user-written data. Values are:
  • true - Disk contains user-written data.
  • false - Disk does not contain user-written data.

attributes.name: isFastCacheInUse
attributes.description:
(Applies if FAST Cache is supported on the system and the corresponding license is installed.) Indicates whether the disk is used by the FAST Cache. Values are:
  • true - Disk is used by the FAST Cache.
  • false - Disk is not used by the FAST Cache.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Usable capacity.

attributes.name: rawSize
attributes.description: Raw (unformatted) capacity.

attributes.name: vendorSize
attributes.description: Vendor capacity of the disk as written on the disk label.

attributes.name: wwn
attributes.description: World Wide Name (WWN) of the disk.

attributes.name: diskTechnology
attributes.description: Disk technology.

attributes.name: parentDae
attributes.description: Parent Disk Array Enclosure (DAE) of the disk as defined by the dae resource type.

attributes.name: parentDpe
attributes.description: Parent Disk Processor Enclosure (DPE) of the disk, as defined by the dpe resource type.

attributes.name: bank
attributes.description: Bank where the disk is located in the parent enclosure.

attributes.name: bankSlotNumber
attributes.description: Bank slot where the disk is located in the parent enclosure.

attributes.name: bankSlot
attributes.description: Combination of the bank and slot name where the disk is located in the parent enclosure.
